data.title: Coast Mental Health
data.meta_description: For 50+ years, Coast Mental Health has empowered the recovery of people with mental illness by providing housing, support services & employment/education.
data.text:
The Courage To Come Back Awards celebrate five British Columbians who have overcome illness or adversity and ‘come back to give back’ to their communities.

The five recipients were celebrated on 23 May 2024 at the Vancouver Convention Centre

Coast Mental Health’s Courage To Come Back Awards – presented by Wheaton Precious Metals – was one of the largest award galas of its kind in Western Canada and a great opportunity to celebrate extraordinary stories of triumph against adversity. The event raised $1.7 million to support folks living with mental illness. We look forward to raising more funds together this year.
